languages.text: "Священник {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Адептус Министорум{/g}... не могла бы и подумать, что один из моего рода окажется в таком положении. Не надо изливать мне догмы Экклезиархии о скромности и служении — я прекрасно знаю, что подобные тебе ориентируются в логистических операциях не хуже зануд из {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Администратума{/g}. Когда торговые интересы прикрыты чаяниями о душах Человечества, любой твой поступок будет вызывать куда меньше вопросов, чем мог бы".

traits.locale_text: "Священник {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Адептус Министорум{/g}... не могла бы и подумать, что один из моего рода окажется в таком положении. Не надо изливать мне догмы Экклезиархии о скромности и служении — я прекрасно знаю, что подобные тебе ориентируются в логистических операциях не хуже зануд из {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Администратума{/g}. Когда торговые интересы прикрыты чаяниями о душах Человечества, любой твой поступок будет вызывать куда меньше вопросов, чем мог бы".

languages.text: "A priest of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g}... I never would have thought that someone of my house would become one. Spare me the recital of your dogmas on humility and service — I am well aware that the Ecclesiarchy is no less versed in matters of logistics than the hairsplitters from the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g}. When your commercial interests are hidden behind a facade of concern for Humanity's souls, any action you take will raise far fewer questions than it would otherwise."

languages.text: “你是{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}国教教会{/g}的牧师……老实说，我从来没想过我的家族会出现这样的后代。先不用和我说那些关于谦卑与忠诚的教条，我很清楚，国教牧师非常了解后勤方面的诸多事项。在这方面，他们与{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}内政部{/g}的官员不相上下。而且，当你打着关心人类灵魂的旗号来谋取商业利益时，质疑你动机的人恐怕会少得多。”
languages.original_text: "A priest of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g}... I never would have thought that someone of my house would become one. Spare me the recital of your dogmas on humility and service — I am well aware that the Ecclesiarchy is no less versed in matters of logistics than the hairsplitters from the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g}. traits.locale_text: “你是{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}国教教会{/g}的牧师……老实说，我从来没想过我的家族会出现这样的后代。先不用和我说那些关于谦卑与忠诚的教条，我很清楚，国教牧师非常了解后勤方面的诸多事项。在这方面，他们与{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}内政部{/g}的官员不相上下。而且，当你打着关心人类灵魂的旗号来谋取商业利益时，质疑你动机的人恐怕会少得多。”

languages.text: «Un{mf||a} sacerdot{mf|e|isa} del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g}... Nunca habría imaginado que alguien de mi casa se dedicaría a eso. Ahórrame el recital del dogma sobre la humildad y el servicio, soy plenamente consciente de que la Eclesiarquía es tan competente en asuntos de logística como los pedantes del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g}. Cuando tus intereses comerciales estén ocultos tras la apariencia de la preocupación por las almas de la humanidad, cualquier acción que tomes despertará menos sospechas de lo normal».
languages.original_text: "A priest of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g}... I never would have thought that someone of my house would become one. Spare me the recital of your dogmas on humility and service — I am well aware that the Ecclesiarchy is no less versed in matters of logistics than the hairsplitters from the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g}. When your commercial interests are hidden behind a facade of concern for Humanity's souls, any action you take will raise far fewer questions than it would otherwise."

Ahórrame el recital del dogma sobre la humildad y el servicio, soy plenamente consciente de que la Eclesiarquía es tan competente en asuntos de logística como los pedantes del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g}. Cuando tus intereses comerciales estén ocultos tras la apariencia de la preocupación por las almas de la humanidad, cualquier acción que tomes despertará menos sospechas de lo normal».

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}帝国宗務局{/g}の司祭…まさか私の家の誰かが司祭になるとは思いもよりませんでした。謙虚さと奉仕についてのあなたの教義をとくとくと述べるのは勘弁してください。帝国聖教会が{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}帝国行政局{/g}の口うるさい者たちと同じように物流問題に精通していることは私もよく知っています。あなたの商業的利益が人類の魂への配慮という表向きのお題目の背後に隠されている時、あなたがとる行動がどのようなものであれ、疑問が生じることは隠されていない場合に比べてはるかに少ないでしょう」
languages.original_text: "A priest of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g}... I never would have thought that someone of my house would become one. Spare me the recital of your dogmas on humility and service — I am well aware that the Ecclesiarchy is no less versed in matters of logistics than the hairsplitters from the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g}. When your commercial interests are hidden behind a facade of concern for Humanity's souls, any action you take will raise far fewer questions than it would otherwise."

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}帝国宗務局{/g}の司祭…私の家の誰かが司祭になるとは思いもよりませんでした。謙虚さと奉仕についてのあなたの教義をとくとくと述べるのは勘弁してください。帝国聖教会が{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}帝国宗務局{/g}の口うるさい者たちと同じように物流問題に精通していることは私もよく知っています。あなたの商業的利益が人類の魂への配慮という表向きのお題目の背後に隠されている時、あなたがとる行動がどのようなものであれ、隠されていない場合に比べて、疑問が生じることははるかに少ないでしょう」

「{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}帝国宗務局{/g}の司祭…まさか私の家の誰かが司祭になるとは思いもよりませんでした。謙虚さと奉仕についてのあなたの教義をとくとくと述べるのは勘弁してください。帝国聖教会が{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}帝国行政局{/g}の口うるさい者たちと同じように物流問題に精通していることは私もよく知っています。あなたの商業的利益が人類の魂への配慮という表向きのお題目の背後に隠されている時、あなたがとる行動がどのようなものであれ、疑問が生じることは隠されていない場合に比べてはるかに少ないでしょう」

languages.text: « {mf|Un prêtre|Une prêtresse} de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g}... Je n'aurais jamais pensé qu'un membre de ma maison remplirait un jour cette fonction. Épargnez-moi vos sermons sur l'humilité et le sens du dévouement ; je suis parfaitement consciente que l'Ecclésiarchie n'est pas moins versée dans les questions de logistique que ces pinailleurs de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g}. Lorsque vos intérêts financiers se dissimulent derrière une façade de préoccupation pour le salut des âmes humaines, toute action entreprise soulève beaucoup moins de questions qu'elle ne l'aurait fait autrement. »
languages.original_text: "A priest of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g}... I never would have thought that someone of my house would become one. Spare me the recital of your dogmas on humility and service — I am well aware that the Ecclesiarchy is no less versed in matters of logistics than the hairsplitters from the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g}. When your commercial interests are hidden behind a facade of concern for Humanity's souls, any action you take will raise far fewer questions than it would otherwise."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Un prêtre|Une prêtresse} de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g}... Je n'aurais jamais pensé qu'un membre de ma maison remplirait un jour cette fonction. Épargnez-moi vos sermons sur l'humilité et le sens du dévouement ; je suis parfaitement consciente que l'Ecclésiarchie n'est pas moins versée dans les questions de logistique que ces pinailleurs de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g}. Lorsque vos intérêts financiers se dissimulent derrière une façade de préoccupation pour le salut des âmes humaines, toute action entreprise soulève beaucoup moins de questions qu'elle ne l'aurait fait autrement. »

languages.text: "{mf|Ein Priester|Eine Priesterin} des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g} ... Ich hätte nie gedacht, dass jemand aus meinem Haus diesen Weg einschlagen würde. Erspart mir Vorträge über Eure Dogmen zu Demut und Dienstbeflissenheit – mir ist bewusst, dass die Ekklesiarchie in Fragen der Logistik ebenso beschlagen ist wie die Haarspalter aus dem {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g}. Wenn kommerzielle Interessen sich hinter einer Fassade der Besorgnis um die Seelen der Menschheit verbergen, wird jede Aktion deutlich weniger infrage gestellt."
languages.original_text: "A priest of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g}... I never would have thought that someone of my house would become one. Spare me the recital of your dogmas on humility and service — I am well aware that the Ecclesiarchy is no less versed in matters of logistics than the hairsplitters from the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g}. When your commercial interests are hidden behind a facade of concern for Humanity's souls, any action you take will raise far fewer questions than it would otherwise."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Ein Priester|Eine Priesterin} des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g} ... Ich hätte nie gedacht, dass jemand aus meinem Haus diesen Weg einschlagen würde. Erspart mir Vorträge über Eure Dogmen zu Demut und Dienstbeflissenheit – mir ist bewusst, dass die Ekklesiarchie in Fragen der Logistik ebenso beschlagen ist wie die Haarspalter aus dem {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g}. Wenn kommerzielle Interessen sich hinter einer Fassade der Besorgnis um die Seelen der Menschheit verbergen, wird jede Aktion deutlich weniger infrage gestellt."

languages.text: "Bir {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g} mensubu... Hanemden birinin rahip olacağı aklıma gelmezdi. Tevazu ve hizmet üzerine dogmalarla kafamı ütüleme sakın. Ekleşiarşi'nin lojistik bilgisi konusunda {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum'un{/g} pimpiriklileriyle yarışacağının gayet farkındayım. Ticari çıkarlarınız insanların ruhları için endişe duyduğunuz yanılsamasının ardına gizlendiğinde, attığınız her adımın sorgulanma ihtimali de düşüyor hâliyle."
languages.original_text: "A priest of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Adeptus Ministorum{/g}... I never would have thought that someone of my house would become one. Ekleşiarşi'nin lojistik bilgisi konusunda {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g}'un pimpiriklileriyle yarışacağının gayet farkındayım. Ticari çıkarlarınız insanların ruhları için endişe duyduğunuz yanılsamasının ardına gizlendiğinde, attığınız her adımın sorgulanma ihtimali de düşüyor hâliyle."

Spare me the recital of your dogmas on humility and service — I am well aware that the Ecclesiarchy is no less versed in matters of logistics than the hairsplitters from the Administratum. When your commercial interests are hidden behind a facade of concern for Humanity's souls, any action you take will raise far fewer questions than it would otherwise."
